005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItemVisitor;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.stream.Stream;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * The interface shared by all atomic items, representing indivisible data
023 * values that serve as the fundamental building blocks for complex data
024 * structures in the Metaschema framework.
025 */
026public interface IAnyAtomicItem extends IAtomicValuedItem {
027  /**
028   * Get the type information for this item.
029   *
030   * @return the type information
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  static IAtomicOrUnionType<?> type() {
034    return IItemType.anyAtomic();
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  @NonNull
039  default IAnyAtomicItem toAtomicItem() {
040    return this;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Get the "wrapped" value represented by this item.
045   *
046   * @return the value
047   */
048  @Override
049  @NonNull
050  Object getValue();
051
052  /**
053   * Get a new {@link IStringItem} based on the the textual value of the item's
054   * "wrapped" value.
055   *
056   * @return a new string item
057   */
058  default IStringItem asStringItem() {
059    return IStringItem.valueOf(asString());
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Get the item's string value.
064   *
065   * @return the string value value of the item
066   */
067  @NonNull
068  String asString();
069
070  @Override
071  default Stream<IAnyAtomicItem> atomize() {
072    return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.of(this));
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get the atomic item value as a map key for use with an {@link IMapItem}.
077   *
078   * @return the map key
079   */
080  @NonNull
081  IMapKey asMapKey();
082
083  /**
084   * Get the item's type adapter.
085   *
086   * @return the type adapter for the item
087   */
088  @NonNull
089  IDataTypeAdapter<?> getJavaTypeAdapter();
090
091  /**
092   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
093   * <p>
094   * This method simply returns the provided item, since it is already the same
095   * type.
096   *
097   * @param item
098   *          the item to cast
099   * @return the provided item
100   */
101  static IAnyAtomicItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
102    return item;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Cast the provided {@code item} to be the same type as this item.
107   *
108   * @param item
109   *          the item to cast
110   * @return an atomic item of this type
111   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
112   *           if the provided item type cannot be cast to this item type
113   */
114  @NonNull
115  IAnyAtomicItem castAsType(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item);
116
117  /**
118   * Compares this value with the argument. Ordering is item type dependent.
119   *
120   * @param other
121   *          the item to compare with this value
122   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
123   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
124   */
125  int compareTo(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem other);
126
127  @Override
128  default void accept(IItemVisitor visitor) {
129    visitor.visit(this);
130  }
131}
